sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Usage">5644a3a71bfe7d1064122144b24bcb05</macroponent><name>stylized_text_150/css</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : "",
  "message" : "Maximize",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : "",
  "message" : "Minimize",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,helpers
}) {
    var val = '';
    var target = '';
    val = api.data.verticalc_headlinemetric2.output.result[0].value;
    target = api.data.verticalc_headlinemetric2.output.result[0].target;
    var direction = api.data.verticalc_headlinemetric2.output.result[0].direction_label;
var max_translated = helpers.translateSync("Maximize");
var min_translated = helpers.translateSync("Minimize");

    if (direction == max_translated) {
        if (val < target) {
            return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-0))}';

        } else {
            return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-0))}';
        }
    } else if (direction == min_translated)
        if (val > target) {
            return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--critical-0))}';

        } else {
            return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color:RGB(var(--now-color_alert--positive-0))}';
        }
    else {
        return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600;}';
    }


}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-05 14:47:41</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f8d4676b1bfe7d1064122144b24bcb18</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_150/css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_f8d4676b1bfe7d1064122144b24bcb18</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-05 14:47:41</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
